git_rationale.root_cause_commit: f0cc710 - checkpoint: Auto-save at 2026-02-10 18:31:24 (initial plan-validate.py creation)
git_rationale.why_issue_occurred: Initial implementation prioritized working validation over flexible architecture. Hardcoded constants (city-currency mappings, keyword lists, agent whitelists) were expedient for single-use case (China trip validation) but don't scale to multiple regions/projects.
git_rationale.how_fix_addresses_root: Applies fix pattern from commit 2e14cfa (removed hardcoded meal keywords) to remaining 9 issues. Moves hardcoded values to: (1) CONFIG dictionary for easy modification, (2) Schema-driven inference for values that can be derived from schemas, (3) Documentation for maintainability. Now supports multiple regions/projects without code changes.

validation_results.comparison:
BEFORE: Hardcoded validation logic caused maintenance burden (code changes needed for new regions) and crashes (TypeError on budget validation).

AFTER: Configuration-based validation enables:
1. Easy customization via CONFIG dict (no code changes)
2. Schema-driven validation stays in sync with schema updates
3. Automatic adaptation to new agents/categories
4. Zero crashes (added type checking for robustness)
5. Better maintainability (comprehensive documentation)
